pullrequest.title: Refactoring the cmake scripts to use ignition-cmake

content.raw:
I've attempted to suppress it using command line arguments for `ign-msgs`, but that attempt failed. [There seem to be cases where the warning refuses to be suppressed](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8598354/why-is-msvc10-ignoring-my-pragma-warningdisable-4251), so there seems to be a possibility that we're stuck with that warning, short of some drastic measures.

Edit: That said, yes, I will attempt to suppress it.
content.html:
I've attempted to suppress it using command line arguments for ign-msgs, but that attempt failed. There seem to be cases where the warning refuses to be suppressed, so there seems to be a possibility that we're stuck with that warning, short of some drastic measures.

Edit: That said, yes, I will attempt to suppress it.
